did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Ana Maria Uribe collection of poetry and media art, 2002-2004.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: One volume of poems by Ana Maria Uribe titled "Tipoemas y Anipoemas, 1968-2001" ("Typoems and Anipoems, 1968-2001"). Also includes a CD-ROM "Escaleras y otros Anipoemas: Poesia visual animada por Ana Maria Uribe, 2002", translated as "Ladders and Other Anipoems: Animated Visual Poetry by Ana Maria Uribe, 2002".

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: One volume of poems by Ana Maria Uribe titled "Tipoemas y Anipoemas, 1968-2001" ("Typoems and Anipoems, 1968-2001"). Also includes a CD-ROM "Escaleras y otros Anipoemas: Poesia visual animada por Ana Maria Uribe, 2002", translated as "Ladders and Other Anipoems: Animated Visual Poetry by Ana Maria Uribe, 2002".

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Rose Goldsen Archive of New Media Art.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: Digital files may not be copied or downloaded without the permission of the Curator and artist.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements:
phystech.p: System requirements for disk: Windows 95 or better.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Ana Maria Uribe Collection of Poetry and Media Art, #8206. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
